summary: REQ-1 appears to be implemented by adding/using a more reliable `openExternally` helper that uses page visibility/blur/pagehide signals plus short delays to distinguish true popup blocking from successful external navigation, which should prevent the erroneous “Unable to Open Link” fallback when the user returns after a successful open.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified URL parameter + sessionStorage utilities unrelated to the link-opening fallback bug fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses only on fixing the gallery link-opening fallback behavior; it does not request URL param parsing/persistence utilities.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/changed FullScreenViewer external-open handling with fallback dialog state/logic (beyond gallery link click handler scope).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 is specifically about the gallery link click handler and its fallback dialog behavior; changes in FullScreenViewer external-open flow are not explicitly requested.
